attributes.action: stop HGV's from driving well below the prescribed speed limits on single track roads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How much money is lost each year through time wasted sitting behind the arbitary tesco or asda restricted lorry each year? Hundreds of motorists doing half of the speed limit, unable to overtake or making dangerous manouvres to get past HGV's doing 35 mph on a 60 mph single track roads. Sign here to keep us all moving, not just the unthinking multinationals.
